childrenComponentProp.name: checked
childrenComponentProp.docblock: If the checkbox is checked or not

childrenComponentProp.name: label
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Label [string or object] for the checkbox. Either this or ariaLabelledBy is required.

childrenComponentProp.name: labelAboveCheckbox
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Descriptive text to sit above the checkbox and label

childrenComponentProp.name: ariaLabelledBy
childrenComponentProp.docblock: aria-labelledby attribute [string] (external-heading ID). Either this or label is required.

childrenComponentProp.name: onValueChange
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Handler for when the checkbox is changed

childrenComponentProp.name: required
childrenComponentProp.docblock: If the checkbox is required or not
